CONTRIBUTIONDISCLOSURE.organizationName: Sylvan Learning, Inc. (Formerly lobbied under the Registration of Educate, Inc.)
CONTRIBUTIONDISCLOSURE.comments: As of March 31, 2013, Mr. Doug Mesecar is no longer an active registered lobbyist and Sylvan Learning is no longer an active registrant. Also, as of May 31, 2013, Mr. Mesecar is no longer employed with Sylvan Learning.
